short_summary: Transportation services to Nelson House in Manitoba
description: Indigenous Services Canada requires reliable roundtrip transportation for FNIHB employees and contracted dentists with FNIHB from the Thompson Airport to its nursing station in Nelson House in Manitoba. The expected start date of the contract is 2024-04-01 and the expected end date is 2024-03-31. The contract includes three one-year option periods.
full_summary:
## Tender Notice - Transportation to Nelson House

### Overview

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is issuing this tender notice for transportation services to be provided by First Nations and Inuit Health Branch (FNIHB) employees and contracted dentists to Nelson House in Manitoba.

### Contract Information

*   **Contract Reference Number**: 1000247613
*   **Contract Title (English)**: Transportation to Nelson House
*   **Contract Title (French)**: Transport à Nelson House
*   **Contract Closing Date**: March 27, 2023, at 13:00:00
*   **Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2023
*   **Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024
*   **Contract Option Dates**: Three one-year options with the same terms and conditions.

### Requirements

*   The contractor will provide round-trip transportation services for FNIHB employees and contracted dentists from the Thompson Airport to the Nelson House nursing station in Manitoba.

### Contact Information

Contact person: Miriam Britel

*   **Email Address**: miriam.britel@sac-isc.gc.ca
*   **Phone Number**: (873) 355-2463

### Attachments

*   [English Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4019/rfp---transportation-to-nelson-house---solicitation-1000247613---en.pdf)
*   [English Attachment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4019/npp---open---nurse-transportation---1000247613-en.pdf)
*   [French Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4019/ddp---transport-a-nelson-house---sollicitation-1000247613---fr.pdf)
*   [French Attachment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4019/apm---ouvert---service-de-transport-pour-infirmieres---1000247613---fr.pdf)

### Bidder Information

Upon receipt of an offer notice from the Tendering Authority that an intention to enter into a contract has been determined with your bidder firm, submit the fully executed tender documents and online DPS screens within 15 days. The bidder who meets the requirements of the Notice of Proposal is
